content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case between two parties referred to as x and y the case involves a dispute over the division of joint assets the court has made a decision to terminate joint ownership of certain properties and allocate them to either x or y the court has also determined the ownership of certain vehicles and financial obligations the court has distributed the parties current accounts and awarded compensation to one of the parties the procedural costs will be borne by both parties either party has the option to appeal the courts decision within 30 days
